profile:
At Long Life, we specialize in three things: replacement windows, replacement doors, and exceptional installation service.


Our team includes the best replacement window installers in the Lower Mainland, with years of experience in the industry, the latest tools, and pride in our work. From fabricating custom replacement window trims, to making friends with the family pet, our installation professionals have the exceptional service attitude that has built our business.


So it only makes sense for us to install the best products available. Our locally made replacement windows and doors are renowned for quality, innovation, and lifetime warranty service.Our hands-on approach ensures we deliver what we promise. And it’s why word of mouth advertising is the biggest builder of our business. 


Our Replacement Windows: We install many kinds of vinyl windows: sliders, crank casement windows, push out casement windows, and tilt and turn windows. You can select optional grids, colours, and window configurations to fit with your home’s current style, or to create a new one.


Our Replacement Doors: We install sliding patio doors, and all kinds of custom entry doors: steel, fiberglass, wood and vinyl. With our extensive options, you can design the door you want.


Getting new windows and replacement doors is easy when you’re working with Long Life, a family-run company with a reputation that speaks for itself. With no subcontracting, no deposits, and lifelong warranties, you’ll always have peace of mind.

profile: Centra Windows is headquartered in Langley BC, with a state of the art manufacturing facility producing the high-quality, energy-efficient vinyl windows. We’ve been in business for over 35 years and with our employees also being our owners – we take pride in the work that we do. We are the industry leaders and are always ahead of our competitors with our products, technology, and service. Visit us in one of our branch locations across BC in: Langley, Victoria, Nanaimo, or Kelowna.

profile: We specialize in replacement windows, doors and patio doors for the residential market and work directly with homeowners, and take care of supplying and installing the windows and doors. We offer energy efficient vinyl windows, steel and fibreglass doors and patio doors. Our window options include casement, awning, slider, hung, bay, bow, shape and combination windows. Our windows and doors available with triple-pane glass on all our models including slider and hung windows. We offer financing options, and have our own dedicated installers. After the installation we dispose of your old windows and doors. All our windows and doors come with product and installation warranty. Our mission is to improve your home!

profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
House Smart Home Improvements
*Vinyl Windows, Exterior Pre-Hung Doors, High efficiency furnaces, Air conditioners , Heat Pump Systems and Tankless Hot Water on demand. Insulation of attics and crawlspaces . Ventilation and Air- Sealing

* We Offer Financing - 50 to 150 per month - No Minimum
* Free In-Home Consultations 
* We Beat any Competitor's pricing! 
*Lifetime warranty
* 25 Year Fully Transferable Window Warranty

House Smart Home Improvements is a member of the Better Business Bureau with an A+ Rating. 
BC Building Envelope Council Members
Fenestration BC Members
Major partner with Fortis BC

We are highly trained and experienced professionals, dedicated to customer satisfaction and the completion of work on time.

We take pride in installing EnergyStar Vinyl Windows and Doors, we DO NOT condone or install with a "Piggyback Installation" Our installations are backed up in writing with a lifetime Quality guarantee.

House Smart has fully trained installers and practice installing with the Best Building Practises Guidelines. 

House Smart works with a deep and fundamental working knowledge with the latest building envelope sciences and put that into our installation methods and practises. This includes the added labour and cost for a waterproof membrane system on the sills and jambs to ensure a leak free installation. 

House Smart Energy-efficient Furnaces, Heat Pumps, Air Conditioning, Hot Water Tanks, Tankless Hot Water Tanks,from the top brands.
GOODMAN
AMANA,
RHEEM,
IBC,
TRIANGLE TUBE,
VIESSMAN,
RINNAI,
NAVIEN.

Draft-proofing, Insulation Services for Attic, Wall , Crawl Space and Basement. We also specialize in Ventilation, Bathroom Fans, and Programmable Thermostats. 

Find out everything you need to know about the EcoEnergy Program and LiveSmart HERO Grants, now offering up to 6000 dollars towards energy-smart home renovations. 

Your friendly and professional House Smart Home Improvement Advisor can fill you in on everything you need to know during your Free In-Home Consultation.

profile:
Doors Galore has been in operation since 1996. We have a  reputation of being one of the lower mainlands best Door companies. Here are a few of the products and services that we provide.

Entry doors; Steel doors, fibreglass doors, wood doors, french doors.
Interior doors; Raised panel, bedroom doors, bifolds, shaker doors, glass doors, mirror doors, pocket doors.

Hardware; handle sets, dead bolts, knobs, levers, hinges.

Painting; we offer complete painting and staining services on the products we sell.

Installations; we offer installation services of the products we sell. 
Our custom prehanging shop allows us to quickly and professionally build almost all styles, designs, and sizes of doors.
